file_content.text: I knew you'd make it!
You should've seen Master Ramos after you stomped his ambush. His face went bright red, then he smashed the comm station.
Master Ramos needs to brush up on his Jedi teachings.
So much for Jedi serenity.
Well, he calmed down quick and started rallying his best defenses. He isn't about to make your break-in easy.
A combat leader's useless if he breaks under pressure.
Amateur.
I'm sorry to say Master Ramos calmed down. Now he's more determined than ever to hold the enclave.
I've inspired my share of frustrations--especially in my enemies.
I have that effect on people.
Now Master Ramos knows who he's dealing with, and he's not taking any chances.
He's got a small army of Green Jedi waiting for you on the other side of that door.
Let's get this door open.
We've got the access codes to get you in. But you should know, Master Ramos sent a small army of Green Jedi your way.
I could stir up a distraction... I'd blow my cover, but I'll do it... if you really want me to.
Your safety isn't my concern. Open this door and get those Jedi out of here.
Distract them. Now.
Always glad to stick my neck out for the Empire.
First I'll use our codes to unlock the gate. Then, hmm... this button looks important....
That'll send those Jedi running. Just get here quickly. Master Ramos won't be happy with me.
The longer you go undetected, the better. I'll dispatch these Jedi myself.
Don't give yourself up.
Good. But I was willing. That's what counts, right?
Now, let's get these doors open. Just enter the two access codes, and... there!
Good luck. I'll see you in no time!
